iti22:2.2: Sukhassetam, bhikkhave, adhivacanam itthassa kantassa piyassa manapassa yadidam punnani.
iti22:2.3: Abhijanami kho panaham, bhikkhave, digharattam katanam punnanam ittham kantam piyam manapam vipakam paccanubhutam.
iti22:2.4: Satta vassani mettacittam bhavetva satta samvattavivattakappe nayimam lokam punaragamasim.
iti22:2.5: Samvattamane sudam, bhikkhave, kappe abhassarupago homi;
iti22:3.1: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, brahma homi mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti.
iti22:3.2: Chattimsakkhattum kho panaham, bhikkhave, sakko ahosim devanamindo;
iti22:3.3: anekasatakkhattum raja ahosim cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
iti22:4.2: ‘kissa nu kho me idam kammassa phalam, kissa kammassa vipako, yenaham etarahi evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo’ti?
iti22:4.4: ‘tinnam kho me idam kammanam phalam, tinnam kammanam vipako, yenaham etarahi evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavoti, seyyathidam—
iti22:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
